introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.description: Welcome to {appName}. {companyName} ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect information in various ways to provide and improve our Service.

userProvided.title: a. Information You Provide to Us

items.1: Account Information: When you create an account, you provide us with a username, password, email address, and date of birth.
items.2: User Content: We collect content you create on the Service, including videos, images, comments, direct messages, and related metadata (time and location of creation).
items.3: Contact Information: If you contact us, we collect information you provide in that process.

thirdParty.title: b. Information from Third Parties
thirdParty.description: If you choose to register or log in using a third-party account (like Google), we receive certain information from that provider, such as your name, email address, profile picture, and account ID, subject to your privacy settings on that service.

items.1: Usage Data: We collect information about how you interact with the Service, such as videos you watch, content you like, users you follow, and searches you make.
items.2: Device and Technical Information: We collect your IP address, device type, operating system, unique device identifiers, browser type, and language settings.
items.3: Location Data: We may collect approximate location information from your IP address or more precise location data from your device's GPS if you allow it.
items.4: Cookies and Similar Technologies: We use cookies to operate and provide the Service, remember your preferences, and analyze performance.

dataUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
dataUse.description: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

items.1: Provide, maintain, and improve our Service.
items.2: Personalize your experience, such as suggesting videos and content we think you'll like (e.g., on your 'For You' page).
items.3: Enable you to interact with other users.
items.4: Communicate with you, including sending service notifications and marketing communications (which you can opt out of).
items.5: Ensure platform safety and security, detect and prevent fraud, spam, and abuse.
items.6: Perform analytics to understand how users interact with our Service and improve our product.

dataSharing.title: 4. How We Share Information
dataSharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information in the following circumstances:
items: With Other Users: Your profile information and publicly posted content will be visible to other users.
With Service Providers: We share information with partners who help us operate the Service, such as cloud storage providers, data analytics, and customer service.
For Legal Reasons: We may disclose your information if required by law or to protect the rights, property, and safety of {companyName}, our users, or the public.
In Business Transfers: If we're involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred.

dataRetention.title: 5. Data Storage and Deletion
dataRetention.description: We store your information as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with the Service. You can delete your account at any time through your app settings. After you delete your account, we will take steps to delete your information, though some information may be retained in backups or for legal purposes.

userRights.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices
userRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
items: Access and Edit: You can view and edit your profile information through your account settings.
Delete: You have the right to request deletion of your account and personal data.
Notification Management: You can manage push notifications and emails in your settings.
Cookie Control: Most web browsers let you control cookies through their settings.

childrenPrivacy.title: 7. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.description: Our Service is not intended for children under 13 (or the minimum age in your region). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you discover that a child has provided us with personal information without parental consent, please contact us so we can delete that information.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When we make significant changes, we will notify you by updating the 'Last Updated' date at the top of this page and/or through in-app notification.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

exitDialog.title: Are you sure you want to exit?
exitDialog.description: Your changes will not be saved.

sizeAndDuration.title: Size and Duration
sizeAndDuration.description: Maximum size: 30 GB, video length: 60 minutes.

fileFormats.title: File Formats
fileFormats.description: Recommended: '.mp4'. Other main formats are supported.

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Share more about your video here...

cover.label: Cover
cover.tooltip: Select a cover image or upload from your device. An attractive cover can make a strong impression on viewers.

AuthLayout.notice: By continuing with an account located in Vietnam, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and acknowledge that you have read our <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

LoginPage.title: Log in to TikTok
LoginPage.description: Manage your account, check notifications, comment on videos, and more.

SignUpPage.title: Sign up for TikTok
SignUpPage.description: Create a profile, follow other accounts, make your own videos, and more.

email.title: Sign up
email.dateOfBirthDescription: Your birthday won't be shown publicly.

emailSent.title: Check your email
emailSent.description: We've sent a password reset link to
emailSent.checkSpam: Don't forget to check your spam folder.

resetPasswordPage.title: Reset password
resetPasswordPage.invalidTokenDescription: This reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new password reset.

success.title: Password reset successful!
success.description: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now login with your new password.
success.signInMessage: You can now sign in with your new password
success.redirectMessage: This window will redirect automatically in a few seconds

username.label: Username
username.hint: Usernames can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and periods. Changing your username will also change your profile link.

name.label: Name
name.hint: Your nickname can only be changed once every 7 days.

noContent.title: No content
noContent.description: This user has not published any videos.

noResults.title: No results found
noResults.description: Try searching with a different keyword.
